front.title: An IP Forwarding Policy Information Base

abstract.t: This draft specifies a set of Policy Rule Classes (PRC) for the enforcement of an IP forwarding policy by COPS-PR-enabled routers. Instances of such classes reside in a virtual information store, which is called the IP Forwarding Policy Information Base. The corresponding IP forwarding policy provisioning data are intended for use by a COPS-PR IP TE Client-Type, and they complement the PRC classes that have been defined in the Framework PIB.
